original_text: Then he brought me to the inner court through the south gate, and he measured the south gate. It was of the same size as the others.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 그 남문을 통하여 안뜰에 들어가서 그 남문의 너비를 측량하니 크기는

sentences.original_text: Then he brought me to the inner court through the south gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그가 나를 남문을 통해 안뜰로 인도했습니다.

sentences.original_text: and he measured the south gate.
It was of the same size as the others.
